name: 李文亞
objective:
奈米科技在近年來有極快的進展，因此在本課程將介紹最新的奈米材料，包含有量子點、奈米碳材(富勒烯、奈米碳管、石墨烯)、二維奈米材料(二硫化鉬)等，以及對於這些奈米材料的物理、化學與光電特性以及製程方法如何應用到光電元件與生醫感測器元件做進一步的介紹，以期許可以帶給同學當今最新的奈米化技術與感測器相關之科技知識。
Nanotechnology has a great progress in recent years. This class will introduce the latest information about nanomaterials and their applications. The nanomaterials include quantum dots, fullerene, carbon nanotube, graphene and molybdenum disulfide. Their physical, chemical, optoelectronic and sensory properties will be comprehensively introduced. We expect to bring the knowledge of newest nanomaterials and technologies to students.
